file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 52-43-05-04 - SERVICE DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SERVICE DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove and install the internal actuating handle of the service door. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY SERVICE DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING ALL 52-43-05-000-801-A HANDLE - REMOVAL SERVICE DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING ALL 52-43-05-400-801-A HANDLE - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 52-43-05 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-43-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. SERVICE DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the internal actuating handle of the service door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-43-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 821 Service door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the service door available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Service door I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the service door (AMM SDS 52-43-00/1). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Release the spring (7) (Sheet 1 of Figure 401). (2) Remove the nut (4), washer (3) and bolt (1) (Sheet 1 of Figure 401). (3) Remove the handle (5) (Sheet 1 of Figure 401). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-43-05 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL NOTE: Be careful not to loose the spacer (6). (4) If necessary, disassemble the internal handle as follows (Sheet 2 of Figure 401): (a) Remove the nut (14), the screw (8), and the spacer (15). (b) Remove the nut (9), washer (7), and screw (3). (c) Remove the bushings (4) and (6). (d) Pull out the stop (16), then remove the bushing (2). (e) From the handle (5), remove the bushing (1) and the bearing (10). (f) From the stop (16), remove the two washers (17), the pin (11), and the roller (12), then release the spring (13). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-43-05 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Internal Actuating Handle - Removal/Installation Figure 401 - Sheet 1 B A ZONE 821 DET. A 1. BOLT 2. NUT 7. SPRING DET. B TORQUE TUBE 3. WASHER 6. SPACER A 4. NUT 5. HANDLE 145AMM520412.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-43-05 Page 4 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Internal Actuating Handle - Removal/Installation Figure 401 - Sheet 2 A 14. NUT 13. SPRING 12. ROLLER 11. PIN 15. SPACER 10. BEARING 16. STOP 17. WASHER 1. BUSHING 9. NUT 8. SCREW 2. BUSHING 7. WASHER 3. SCREW 6. BUSHING 4. BUSHING 5. HANDLE 145AMM520413.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 52-43-05 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 52-43-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. SERVICE DOOR INTERNAL ACTUATING HANDLE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the internal actuating handle of the service door. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-43-00/1 SERVICE-DOOR ACTUATING AND LOCKING MECH- AMM TASK 52-43-06-700-801-A/500 ANISM - FUNCTIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 821 Service door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the service door available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Service door I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) If applicable, assemble the internal handle as follows (Sheet 2 of (Figure 401): (a) Attach the spring (13) to the roller (12). (b) Position the roller (12) on the stop (16), install the pin (11), and install the two washers (17). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-43-05 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (c) Install the bushing (2) on the stop (16). (d) Install the bearing (10) and the bushing (1) on the handle (5). (e) Position the stop on the handle (5), then install the bushings (4) and (6), the screw (3), the washer (7), and the nut (9). (f) Install the screw (8), the spacer (15) and the nut (14). (2) Install the spacer (6) on the torque tube (Sheet 1 of (Figure 401). (3) Install the handle (5) on the torque tube. (4) Install the bolt (1), the washer (3), and the nut (4). (5) Attach the spring (7) to the nut (2). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Do a functional check of the service door ( AMM TASK 52-43-06-700-801-A/500). (2) Close the service door (AMM SDS 52-43-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 52-43-05 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
